Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model

Class GameState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.GameState
public class GameState
extends java.lang.Object
Represents the state of the Game, holding all the players, the player who's playing and the current phase of each turn

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private PossiblePhases currentPhase  
    private Player currentPlayer  
    private java.util.List<Player> playerList  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    GameState​(java.util.List<Player> pList)
    Creates a GameState in which the playerList is the parameter passed, set currentPlayer as the firs in the list pList and set the currentPhase as the first phase contained in the player's god card

    • GameState

      public GameState​(java.util.List<Player> pList)
      Creates a GameState in which the playerList is the parameter passed, set currentPlayer as the firs in the list pList and set the currentPhase as the first phase contained in the player's god card
      Parameters:
      pList - List of playing players

    • nextPhase

      public void nextPhase() throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Method used to change the turn's phase If a next phase exist simply refreshes GameState, otherwise throws an exception
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - to let know the caller that there's no more phases left

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn()
      Used to change the current turn, so changes the player and set the first phase

      Used to change the playing player
      Returns:
      Player who is the next player
